code: import*as yup from"yup";export var validationPostAndDialog=yup.object({text:yup.string().max(100,'max 100 symbol').required('Field is required')});export var validationLogin=yup.object({email:yup.string().email('Enter a valid email').required('Email is required'),password:yup.string().min(4,'Password should be of minimum 4 characters length').required('Password is required')});
